channel.title: Geophysical on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS
channel.description: Recent content in Geophysical on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS

item.title: QField for Geological and Geophysical Surveys
item.description:
What you can do

  • Geological mapping and structural data
  • Sampling and outcrop documentation
  • Geophysical station mapping and logs

Works with QGIS and QFieldCloud

Prepare projects in QGIS and synchronize work across teams via QFieldCloud.
